postInvalidate().Description: Posts a message to schedule a call to @B_android#support#wearable#watchface#CanvasWatchFaceService#Engine#onDraw_E@ to draw the next frame. Unlike @B_android#support#wearable#watchface#CanvasWatchFaceService#Engine#invalidate_E@, this method is thread-safe and may be called on any thread.

invalidate().Description: Schedules a call to @B_android#support#wearable#watchface#CanvasWatchFaceService#Engine#onDraw_E@ to draw the next frame. Must be called on the main thread.

ClassDesc: The actual implementation of a watch face that draws on a http:##developer#android#com@B_android#graphics#Canvas_E@. You must implement https:##developer#android#com@B_android#support#wearable#watchface#CanvasWatchFaceService#onCreateEngine_E@ to return your concrete Engine implementation.
